description: Palindromes with exactly 10 prime factors (counted with multiplicity).
mathematica: Select[Range[2, 10000000], IntegerDigits[ # ] == Reverse[IntegerDigits[ # ]] && Plus @@ Transpose[FactorInteger[ # ]][[2]] == 10 &] - _Tanya Khovanova_, Sep 07 2007
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1998.
